player.name: Michael Jordan
player.jerseyDescription: red and black basketball jersey with white trim, no logos
player.physicalDescription: athletic build, shaved head, intense focused expression
player.archetype: The GOAT, ultimate competitor, clutch performer

figure.name: Moses
figure.attributeDescription: wooden staff crackling with divine energy
figure.physicalDescription: long flowing beard, robes, weathered but powerful presence
figure.archetype: The Lawgiver, led his people through the wilderness

connection.thematic: Both led their people through impossible odds to the promised land
connection.narrative: Moses parted the Red Sea. MJ parted defenders. Same energy.
connection.relationship: Leaders who demanded excellence and delivered miracles

interactions.description: Standing back-to-back, arms crossed, looking outward with confidence
Dynamic high-five mid-air, energy crackling between their hands
Jordan flying over a parting crowd while Moses raises his staff
